title: Kan zinkawngah
lyrics:
Kan zinkawngah hian Lalpa min hruai la,
Tuifawnten min chim kan pil thuai dawn e;
I lam kan lo hawi khua kan tlai hma hian,
Lo hnai rawh, aw chhandamtu.

Chhandamtu min hruai rawh kan zinkawngah hian,
Thli leh ruah, tuifawnten min chim reng e;
Kan dinna lungpui nghing ve ngai lo chuan,
Van thlen thlengin min kai ang che.

Khawvelin min au ding leh vei lamah,
Hmuhsitna au thawmten min rawn thawng a;
Harsatna kara kan mittui far hi,
Lawmna hla an chang ngei ang.

Damchhung ni chhiar dan min zirtir ang che,
I van chanchin khi min hrilh nawn fo la;
Zinkawng thui tak hi nang tel lo chuanin,
Kan zuam lo, min hruai ang che.
